annotations.description: That's the end of the match.

The Real Madrid players keep the ball and are exchanging a combination of passes. They are waiting for gaps in the defence to open up.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 2 min. of added time.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) crosses into the box from near the side line, but he doesn't connect as he wanted and it's cleared by the well organized defence.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) takes the corner with a short pass.

Marcelo (Real Madrid) sends a long through ball to Cristiano Ronaldo, but he fails to control it properly and loses it to one of the defending players. The ball is behind the touchline and Real Madrid will take a throw in.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: GOAL! Superb work from Isco, who plays a vital role in the build up. He squares it to Gareth Bale (Real Madrid), who beats Diego Lopez with a brilliant shot into the bottom right corner. 2:0.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Casemiro (Real Madrid) is shown a yellow card after a horrible tackle.

Pepe (Real Madrid) reacts well and displays good awareness near the penalty spot to get on the end of a cross from the free kick. He jumps high and produces a header which goes well wide of the right post.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Quique Flores has decided to substitute Jose Manuel Jurado and he is replaced by Alvaro Vazquez (Espanyol).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Nacho trots off the pitch and is replaced by Marcelo (Real Madrid).

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Aaron Caricol (Espanyol) takes his opponent down and receives a yellow card from the referee.

This would have been a magnificent goal from Lucas (Real Madrid), who collected the ball inside the box and prodded a first time shot on goal that flew just narrowly wide of the right post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Espanyol.
Alberto Undiano Mallenco has a clear sight and sees a foul from Nacho (Real Madrid).
Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) tries his luck with a long range effort after receiving a precise pass, but Diego Lopez has a clear view of it and makes a comfortable save.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Isco (Real Madrid) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.
Isco (Real Madrid) sends a pass into the box, but his attempt is thwarted and cleared. Real Madrid force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.

Jose Manuel Jurado (Espanyol) tries to hit a shot towards goal from long range, but he miskicks the ball and it flies high over the crossbar. The ball goes out of play and Real Madrid will have a goal kick.
Alberto Undiano Mallenco blows his whistle as Hernan Perez (Espanyol) used excessive force in the tackle during an attack.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: It's time for a substitution. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) comes on in place of Alvaro Morata.

Alvaro Morata sends a lovely lofted pass forward that flies over the top of the defence and into the path of Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid), but he can't direct his header on target as it flies well over the bar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Espanyol.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Pape Diop (Espanyol) commits a foul and is shown a yellow card without any hesitation from the referee.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) takes the corner which is cleared by the opposition's defence.
Alberto Undiano Mallenco blows his whistle. Hernan Perez (Espanyol) commits a foul after dangerous play.
What a miskick by Casemiro (Real Madrid). He smashes a volley from long distance that goes into the stands.

annotations.description: The resulting corner from Pablo Piatti (Espanyol) is cleared.

Francisco Casilla hears the fans clapping his superb goalkeeping. Hernan Perez (Espanyol) shoots from the edge of the box towards the right side of the goal, but the goalkeeper makes a magnificent save. Corner kick. Espanyol will have an opportunity.
